description: The entrance from the street does little to prepare you for the surprise that awaits once you’ve taken the lift down to this restaurant, where the dining room looks out at the beach and guests dine with the sound of the waves as a romantic backdrop. In a modern and minimalist setting, chef Lino Scarallo offers a choice of tasting menus, include a surprise option on which he has carte blanche, and others based on signature dishes that include raw fish options and meat specialities.
